title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Ravens L Rebound, Zac Taylor Criticism
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Ravens L Rebound, Zac Taylor Criticism
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why there’s no walking back Commanders HC Ron Rivera’s negative public comments about Carson Wentz, and how offensive head coaches are reshaping college football like the NFL.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow joins Colin to discuss losing a nail biter to AFC North rival Ravens, how he processes and moves past a tough loss (9:00), why it’s important for him to look for big play opportunities despite opposing teams specifically game planning to prevent them (11:00), why he still has confidence in HC Zac Taylor despite heavy media criticism (12:00), if he was surprised that his comments about playing through concussions gained media traction (14:00), the biggest adjustment moving from Columbus to Louisiana to finish his college career (21:00), what the Bengals are doing well and what they need to improve through 5 weeks (24:00), how he would handle a backup QB like Cooper Rush threatening his starting job (29:00). 

Joe also answers some rapid fire questions, including the fiercest competitor he’s faced, the most talented non-Bengals receiver, and the most physically freakish opponent, and which player gets the Burrow stamp of approval for the best fashion sense (34:00). 

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates, check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action, and visit Cuts to get the best fall fits! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
